attribute.value: select fa.fabh from khfa_khzbpz pz,KHFA_FAPZ fa where pz.fabh=fa.fabh and pz.khzbdh=$khzbdh$ and fa.khdx='1'

select distinct key,value from ( select a.zbdh as key, a.zbmc as value from khdx_zb a inner join khdx_zbtjkj b on a.zbdh=b.zbdh inner join khdx_zblb c on a.zbdh=c.zbdh and $sysdate$ between c.qsrq and c.jsrq where a.zbzt!=1 and a.sfxs != '1' and c.ywlb='$ywlb$' and b.tjkj!=2 order by a.zbpx, a.zbdh) d
select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where lower(dmmc) = 'zbtjkj' and rtrim(dmz) in (select cast(tjkj as VARCHAR(20)) from khdx_zbtjkj where zbdh= $zbdh$ and tjkj!=2) order by dmz
select count(1) as nums from khfa_khzbpz zbpz inner join khfa_khzb_jg hy on hy.KHZBDH=zbpz.KHZBDH where hy.KHZBMC = '$dkhzbmc$'
select coalesce(max(khzbdh),0)+1 as ID from khfa_khzb_jg
select jg.khzbdh from khfa_khzb_jg jg where jg.khzbmc!='$oldkhzbmc$' and jg.khzbmc='$khzbmc$'

select distinct key,value from ( select a.zbdh as key, a.zbmc as value from khdx_zb a inner join khdx_zbtjkj b on a.zbdh=b.zbdh inner join khdx_zblb c on a.zbdh=c.zbdh and $sysdate$ between c.qsrq and c.jsrq where a.zbzt!=1 and a.sfxs != '1' and c.ywlb='$ywlb$' and b.tjkj!=2 order by a.zbpx, a.zbdh) d
select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where lower(dmmc) = 'zbtjkj' and rtrim(dmz) in (select cast(tjkj as VARCHAR(20)) from khdx_zbtjkj where zbdh= $zbdh$ and tjkj!=2) order by dmz
select count(1) as nums from khfa_khzbpz zbpz inner join khfa_khzb_jg hy on hy.KHZBDH=zbpz.KHZBDH where hy.KHZBMC = '$dkhzbmc$'
select coalesce(max(khzbdh),0)+1 as ID from khfa_khzb_jg
select jg.khzbdh from khfa_khzb_jg jg where jg.khzbmc!='$oldkhzbmc$' and jg.khzbmc='$khzbmc$'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select khzb.khzbdh,khzb.khzbmc,khzb.zbdh,zb.zbmc,khzb.sdbs,dmms1.dmms as sdbsmc, khzb.bz,dmms2.dmms as bzmc,khzb.tjkj,dmms3.dmms as tjkjmc, zblb.ywlb,khzb.zbpx,'引用方案' as yyfa from khfa_khzb_jg khzb inner join khdx_zblb zblb on zblb.zbdh=khzb.zbdh and zblb.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh=khzb.zbdh inner join csb_dmms dmms1 on lower(dmms1.dmmc)='zbsdbs' and dmms1.dmz=khzb.sdbs inner join csb_dmms dmms2 on lower(dmms2.dmmc)='zbbz' and dmms2.dmz=khzb.bz inner join csb_dmms dmms3 on lower(dmms3.dmmc)='tjkj' and dmms3.dmz=khzb.tjkj where 1=1 and khzb.khzbmc like '%$khzbmc$%' and zb.zbmc like '%$zbmc$%' order by zbpx

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select khzb.khzbdh,khzb.khzbmc,khzb.zbdh,zb.zbmc,khzb.sdbs,dmms1.dmms as sdbsmc, khzb.bz,dmms2.dmms as bzmc,khzb.tjkj,dmms3.dmms as tjkjmc, zblb.ywlb,khzb.zbpx,'引用方案' as yyfa from khfa_khzb_jg khzb inner join khdx_zblb zblb on zblb.zbdh=khzb.zbdh and zblb.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh=khzb.zbdh inner join csb_dmms dmms1 on lower(dmms1.dmmc)='zbsdbs' and dmms1.dmz=khzb.sdbs inner join csb_dmms dmms2 on lower(dmms2.dmmc)='zbbz' and dmms2.dmz=khzb.bz inner join csb_dmms dmms3 on lower(dmms3.dmmc)='tjkj' and dmms3.dmz=khzb.tjkj where 1=1 and khzb.khzbmc like '%$khzbmc$%' and zb.zbmc like '%$zbmc$%' order by zbpx ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select ZBPX, ZBDH, TJKJ, KHZBDH, KHZBMC, SDBS, BZ from KHFA_KHZB_JG where 1= 1 and KHZBDH = $khzbdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select ZBPX, ZBDH, TJKJ, KHZBDH, KHZBMC, SDBS, BZ from KHFA_KHZB_JG where 1= 1 and KHZBDH = $khzbdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into KHFA_KHZB_JG( BZ, ZBPX, ZBDH, TJKJ, KHZBMC, KHZBDH, SDBS ) values ( '$bz$',$zbpx$,$zbdh$,'$tjkj$','$khzbmc$',$khzbdh$,'$sdbs$')
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update KHFA_KHZB_JG set BZ = '$bz$',ZBPX = $zbpx$,ZBDH = $zbdh$,TJKJ = '$tjkj$',KHZBMC = '$khzbmc$',SDBS = '$sdbs$' where 1=1 and KHZBDH = $khzbdh$
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from KHFA_KHZB_JG where 1=1 and KHZBDH = $khzbdh$
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select fa.fabh from khfa_khzbpz pz,KHFA_FAPZ fa where pz.fabh=fa.fabh and pz.khzbdh=$khzbdh$ and fa.khdx='1'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select coalesce(max(khzbdh),0)+1 as ID from khfa_khzb_jg
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select jg.khzbdh from khfa_khzb_jg jg where jg.khzbmc!='$oldkhzbmc$' and jg.khzbmc='$khzbmc$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct key,value from ( select a.zbdh as key, a.zbmc as value from khdx_zb a inner join khdx_zbtjkj b on a.zbdh=b.zbdh inner join khdx_zblb c on a.zbdh=c.zbdh and $sysdate$ between c.qsrq and c.jsrq where a.zbzt!=1 and a.sfxs != '1' and c.ywlb='$ywlb$' and b.tjkj!=2 order by a.zbpx, a.zbdh) d

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where lower(dmmc) = 'zbtjkj' and rtrim(dmz) in (select cast(tjkj as VARCHAR(20)) from khdx_zbtjkj where zbdh= $zbdh$ and tjkj!=2) order by dmz
